2164.subject: SPSY
2164.descrlong:
This course examines theory and practice of prevention, intervention, and consultation in schools. This course describes design, implement, and evaluate school-based psychological services, an overview of prevention models to promote the academic and social success of all students;  introduction to strategies for targeted interevention; and intensive psychotherapeutic interventions. Delivery of evidence-based direct and consultative psych services to individuals, groups, and systems is covered.

(Prereq: SPSY 550)
